definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wrap closely, tightly, enwrap, envelope (Ar. la0t.a cleave, stick to a thing; also trans. make to stick, or adhere);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[לָאט]] 2Sa 19:15 (so rd., for MT [[לָאַט]], We Klo Dr Bu); Pt. act. [[לוֹט]] Is 25:7 (cf. Kö:i. 445); Pt. pass. f. [[לוּטָה]] 1Sa 21:10; —[[לוּטָה בַשִּׂמְלָה]] 1Sa 21:10 it is wrapped up in a garment (of sword of Goliath); fig. of covering as sign of mourning, [[הַלּוֹט]] [[פְּנֵי־הַלּוֹט]] [[עַל־כָל־הָעַמִּים]] Is 25:7 the surface of covering which covereth over all the peoples (‖[[מַסֵּכָה הַנְּסוּכָה ]]).
